common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this api to get detail information of many return by shop id.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The period between create_time_from and created_time_of must not more than 15 days.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The update_time_from must be after create_time_from.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query offer info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query order info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query proof info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Query return info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: Get user info failed. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Return SN or ID is invalid.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: The return you queried doesn't exist.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Please link shop and partner on seller center.

{"request_params":[{"name":"page_no","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"1","type":"int64","description":"Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is 0. if data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.","key":"GmdASGd"},{"name":"page_size","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"10","type":"int64","description":"if many items are available to retrieve, you may need to call GetReturnList multiple times to retrieve all the data. Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Default is 40. Use the Pagination filters to control the maximum number of entries (<= 100) to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), the offset number to start next call. True means main item, false means sub item.","key":"bGyPwWB"},{"sample":"0","type":"int64","name":"add_on_deal_id","description":"The unique identity of an addon deal.","key":"zNBSbXc"},{"sample":"2147533133","type":"int64","name":"item_id","description":"The id of item.","key":"baGeSTd"},{"sample":"USB","type":"string","name":"item_sku","description":"The sku of item.","key":"jfBQhbc"},{"sample":"RED","type":"string","name":"variation_sku","description":"The variation sku of item","key":"FJfhjRm"}],"name":"item","key":"QrMsjPp"},{"sample":"200203C6W0AR27","type":"string","name":"order_sn","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an order.","key":"MkybdZE"},{"sample":"1655438336","type":"timestamp","name":"return_ship_due_date","description":"The due date for buyer to ship order.","key":"aHPyACz"},{"sample":"1655438336","type":"timestamp","name":"return_seller_due_date","description":"The due date for seller to deal with this return when buyer have shipped order.","key":"hJWwXsX"},{"sample":"PENDING_RESPOND","type":"string","name":"negotiation_status","description":"Counter status. See \"Data Definition - NegotiationStatus\"","key":"tyNrnAp"},{"sample":"PENDING","type":"string","name":"seller_proof_status","description":"

Proof status. See \"Data Definition - SellerProofStatus\"

","key":"hSrPkKY"},{"sample":"PENDING_REQUEST","type":"string","name":"seller_compensation_status","description":"Compensation status. See \"Data Definition - SellerCompensationStatus\"","key":"tmaGKJd"},{"description":"

To indicate whether the return is RRBOC (Return/Refund request raised before Order Complete) or RRAOC (Return/Refund request raised after Order Complete).

","name":"return_refund_type","sample":"RRAOC","type":"string","required":null,"key":"mWhQsJG"},{"description":"

To indicate the most updated solution of the Return/Refund request (NOTE: this is not the solution during negotiation). Applicable value: 

- 0: Return and Refund

- 1: Refund Only

","name":"return_solution","sample":"0","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"twTMmGQ"},{"description":"

To indicate whether the return_sn is using the “Seller Arrange” return method. This would only be True for TW and BR.

","name":"is_seller_arrange","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"kKKPpfp"},{"description":"

To indicate whether uploading shipping proof is mandatory for seller to confirm \"Arrange Pickup\" when is_seller_arrange = true.

","name":"is_shipping_proof_mandatory","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"ntNdfPy"},{"description":"

To indicate the type of return refund request, whether it is a Normal RR request, an In-transit RR request, and a Return on the Spot: 

0: Normal RR (RR is raised by the buyer after delivery done / estimated delivery date)

1: In-transit RR (RR is raised by the buyer while item is still in-transit to buyer)

2: Return-on-the-Spot (RR is raised by the driver after buyer rejected parcel at delivery)

","name":"return_refund_request_type","sample":"0","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"hdXRyrG"},{"description":"

To indicate whether seller or warehouse will expect to receive the return parcel from buyer and validate the condition of the parcel: 

- seller_validation 

- warehouse_validation

","name":"validation_type","sample":"seller_validation","type":"string","required":null,"key":"DjWXPTw"}],"name":"return","key":"NijfxPD"}],"key":"RMCtDc"}]}

update_log_list.content: Add return_refund_request_type and validation_type response fields
Add is_seller_arrange and is_shipping_proof_mandatory response fields
Add new return_refund_type and return_solution response parameters, and add NOT_NEEDED option for seller_proof_status
Update fields description for TW sensitive data tightening
